Articles.Content:
I made this... because I was bored:rolleyes:

![57dHomT.png](http://i.imgur.com/57dHomT.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Rcjzp)

It flies very well, just keep on pitching up and you can land at <40M/S

To lift off, just pull up.

Enjoy, and I'll leave you with this image of a MASSIVE KERBAL! AHH! HE'LL DESTROY THE KSC! RUN! IT'S ATTILA!

![hMjsekb.png](http://i.imgur.com/hMjsekb.png)

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Float-plane)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:09:33Z" title="06/27/2015 03:09  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
I have to "spread rep around.." Nice plane, though!
